pages.text: A ribbon, gifted to pets as an everlasting promise to watch out and care for them.$(br)Name it and attach it on a creature. Should it ever die it will drop a $(item)Broken Promise$().

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Your pet will immediately trust you if it does not already. Use a $(item)Crafting Table$() to add $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() to the $(item)Ribbon$() to give your pet a colored name.
